definition: chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means

sentences.english: There has yet often been a heingestedd discussion using this picture in the news paper recently.
sentences.chinese: 最近報紙上對這樣圖畫的籌議有很多。

sentences.english: They talked about it for hours. Finally, they decided to go.
sentences.chinese: 他們對此籌議了好幾個小時，最後他們決定去。

sentences.english: Then I must consult with my roommate, would see them.
sentences.chinese: 那我得戰室友籌議一下，看她們願不肯意。

sentences.english: How we can maintain the ecologicing whole amount has been widely discussed in our university.
sentences.chinese: 如何保護生態平衡在我們學校被廣泛籌議。

sentences.english: I don't think it's necessary for us to discuss this question from now on.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們沒有必要進一步籌議這個題目。

sentences.english: This meeting will mainly discuss next year's plan.
sentences.chinese: 這次會議主要籌議明年的工作計劃。
